meanings.definition: A medical student or recent graduate serving in a hospital under supervision.
meanings.sent1: The internes assisted the doctors during surgeries.
meanings.sent2: The hospital had a team of dedicated internes helping with patient care.
meanings.sent3: The internes accidentally mixed up the patient's charts, causing a bit of confusion.
meanings.sent4: The internes were the eager apprentices of the experienced physicians.
meanings.sent5: The internes learned valuable skills through hands-on experience in the hospital.
